column1: The Pit Room////After we finished our food
column2: the queso was still not out. THEN we saw her walking around with the queso in her hand
column3: but of course she didn't know who to give it to cause she never looked at us. So she walked a full circle around the restaurant and when we came up to her to tell her it's ours
column4: she said "you saw me walking around?" Like it was our fault for not letting her know. Well excuse me
column5: we didn't know if it was ours or another table's and maybe if you looked at us while you talked then you would've known who's it is....
